SEARCH

Uses of Package
main

Packages that use main
Package
Description
arcs
Provides the different types of Arcs that are present in the PetriNet Content: - ArcPT An Arc exiting from a Place and entering into a Transition - ArcTP An Arc exiting from a Transition and entering into a Place - ArcDrain An ArcPT which when fired drains all tokens from its Place - ArcZero An ArcPT which can only be fired when its Place has no tokens
interfaces
Provides the different interfaces Content : - IPetriNet Interface for a PetriNet, outlining methods for adding,removing, and retrieving places, transitions, and arcs within the net.
main
Provides main building blocks of the PetriNet : Content - Arc - Place - Transition - PetriNet
  • Classes in main used by arcs
    Class
    Description
    Arc
    The Arc class models an arc in a PetriNet, connecting a Place and a Transition with a specific weight.
    Place
    Place models a location in the PetriNet where tokens are held.
    Transition
    Transition models a transition in the PetriNet.
  • Classes in main used by interfaces
    Class
    Description
    Place
    Place models a location in the PetriNet where tokens are held.
    Transition
    Transition models a transition in the PetriNet.
  • Classes in main used by main
    Class
    Description
    PetriNet
    PetriNet implements the IPetriNet interface, providing methods to manage places, transitions, and various arcs in a PetriNet, including adding, removing, and retrieving components.
    Place
    Place models a location in the PetriNet where tokens are held.
    Transition
    Transition models a transition in the PetriNet.
